TopicTitle: [1.12.2]game freeze (kerbal space program not responding)when a space station is loaded from tracking station instead of incoming vessel

Articles.Content:
I have found a weird bug , i was building my station with orbital modules until i later decided to rename the vessel after the station was loaded from tracking station the entire game stopped responding and was responded ,the vessel seemed to loaded at first as i can see the vessel orbiting kerbin for one but after one second the game stopped responding.the game would respond from time to time without progression in mission time , it happened twice but if i launch a vehicle from space center and  rendezvous the station it loads just fine (2.1km the vessel 200m physics) and i can even switch to it without problems this only occurs if the station is loaded from the tracking station... 

mod list

Edited October 24, 2021 by tonimark
adding logs

EDIT:i tried this fix and it worked, turns out that these gathered re-entry pods were causing stack overflow ... by going to space station and dedocking these pods(yes i have a docked module so i can swap them with new ones if all re-entry capsules are depleted) fixed the freezing issue on loading... althought inital test in space showed no odd behavier , probably a trentares issue (with kerbalism)
